summary: An Ordinance consenting to and authorizing the construction and alteration by the Antimony Smelting and Refining Company, a corporation, of such furnaces, buildings, and machinery as may be necessary to adapt and equip the plant known as the "Denny Renton Sewer Pipe Plant" at Van Asselt Station, in the southerly portion of the City of Seattle, for the reduction and requirements specified herein.
